list_definition.definition: in the United States, the chief law officer of a county, concerned with maintaining peace and order

list_ex_of_english: During a sequence of leapfrogging justice extending over five years, the respective duties of sheriffs, marshals, court clerks, federal commissioners, and judges would all become issues of litigation.
